title.v: Lọc chi tiết theo đơn vị mua hàng

command.text: declare @roleAccess bit, @roleNew bit, @roleEdit bit, @roleDel bit if @@admin = 1 select @roleAccess = 1, @roleNew = 1, @roleEdit = 1, @roleDel = 1 else begin select @roleAccess = r_access, @roleNew = r_new, @roleEdit = r_edit, @roleDel = r_del from bisyspurorgrights where user_id = @@userID and ma_bp0 = @ma_bp0 end select '' as field, '' as message, 'this.grid._ownerRights = [' + rtrim(@roleAccess) + ',' + rtrim(@roleNew) + ',' + rtrim(@roleEdit) + ',' + rtrim(@roleDel) + '];' as script return
